name: §e§nShulker Qualities I
description: Being related to Shulkers, you have inherited some of their traits.

text: You have the ability to teleport like Shulkers, teleporting to a nearby but safer location when in dangerous situations.
While under §e50%§r health and taking damage, you have a §e30%§r chance to teleport once. This will set your cooldown to §a15§r seconds.
If you are hit again after you teleported, you have a §e60%§r chance to teleport again. This will set your cooldown to §a30§r seconds.
If you are taking damage in a pool of water or lava with no land nearby, you may teleport extremely far or will not even teleport.
This passive is disabled when §d§nFortified Shell§r is active.
You can imitate the Shulker Bullets from the Shulkers through archery but because your hands are weirdly formed, you cannot effectively shoot a bow or crossbow.
Whenever you hit a target with an arrow, they will receive the §cLevitation§r effect for §c20§r seconds.
